recipes.title: Salmon Tacos
ingredients: 8. 2 Tbsp hot honey, more as desired
directions: 1. In a small bowl, mix brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
2. Remove skin from salmon filets and cut into 1½ pieces. Pat with paper towel to dry.
3. Rub with 1 tablespoon olive oil and coat with spice blend.
4. Heat 1 Tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Once hot, add the salmon to the pan and cook for 2 minutes - do not move it.
6. Flip and continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 145ºF.
7. Add to a new bowl and toss with hot honey.

sub-recipe.title: Strawberry Pineapple Salsa
directions: 1. Chop all ingredients and mix together in a large bowl.
